p: Wild edible fruits are important in the economy, medicine, and forage [ 7â€“ 9]. Not only are they important in these aspects, besides they have a role in preserving cultural heritages and maintaining ecological balance [ 10]. In Ethiopia, it is common to consume wild fruit crops mostly in rural areas. These wild plants are important as a food supplement, means of survival during drought periods, as medicine, a source of fuelwood, as animal feed, and to protect soil erosion [ 11].
